story: Qasim Ghafurzai was born in the city of Kabul in Afghanistan. He grew up in a devout Muslim family and learned to take pride in his heritage at a young age. His family moved to Iran when he was a teenager, and he became fluent in Persian. After completing his mandatory military service in Iran, he returned to Afghanistan and joined the Afghan National Army. Qasim served his country for several years, becoming a skilled marksman and tactician.
